50226.「私は これから お城に行ってみます。\n 失った記憶の手がかりが\n あそこに:
I was just about to head to the castle. I have
a feeling I'll find clues to my lost memories
inside there...

50230.「こんなに立派な物が 作られるなんて……。\n いったい 誰の像なんでしょうか？:
I can't believe they made something this
magnificent. Whose statue is it, I wonder?

50231.「この像は 王国に伝わる\n 勇者の姿を かたどったものさ。:
This statue is a replica of a Hero from the
kingdom's past.

50232.「祈りを捧げにきた。\n すまないが 場所を空けてくれるか。:
I came here to pray. Sorry, but could you give
me some space?

50234.「そうだ。私のご先祖さまというわけだ。: That's right. They are my ancestor.

50237.「私と 同じ顔……？\n いったい どうして……。: You have the same face as me? How did you...

50238.「お前は 何者だ？\n なぜ 私と 同じ顔をしている！？: Who are you? Why do you look like me?!

50239.「わっ……わかりません。\n 私 何も 思いだせないんです。\n 自分が誰なのか:
I... I don't know. I can't remember anything.
I don't even know who I am...

50241.「それすらも わからないんです。\n このグランゼドーラ王国に来れば\n 何か:
I have no idea... I thought that by coming
here to Gran Zedora, it would help me to
remember something...

50243.「私は アンルシア。\n このグランゼドーラ王国の 姫であり\n 勇者としての:
I am Anlucia. Princess of the Kingdom of Gran
Zedora. I am known as the great Hero.

50245.「……本当の名前は 覚えていません。\n ミシュア……と 呼んでください。:
I don't remember my real name. But you can
call me... Mishua.

50246.「ならば ミシュア。\n くわしい話は 場所を変えて 聞くとしよう。\n ２階の:
Mishua, I see. In that case, we can go
somewhere else to continue our chat. Can you
meet me in the throne room upstairs?

50248.「……ふむ。見たところ お前は\n ミシュアの友人のようだな。\n お前にも 玉:
And you, you seem to be Mishua's friend. I'd
like it if you could join us in the throne
room.

50249.「なぜ グランゼドーラの姫さまが\n 私と同じ顔を しているんでしょうか……。:
Why does the Princess of Gran Zedora look just
like me...?

50250.「姫さまに 話を聞いてもらおうと思います。\n <pc>さんも 呼ばれましたよね:
I'll have to ask her about that. Come on,
let's go and meet her upstairs.

50252.「そう……。私のそばには いつも誰かがいて\n 私のことを守ってくれていた。:
That's right... there was always someone by my
side who protected me.

50253.「でも 思いだせない……。\n あの人は いったい 誰なの……？: But I can't remember... Just who are they?

50254.「<pc>さん。\n 助けにきてくれたんですね。: You've come to help me, right?

50255.「……私なんかのために\n 何度も ありがとうございます。: Thank you again for always being there for me.

50256.「アンルシア姫さまは 私のことを\n 自分の 失われた半身だと……\n ひとりの:
Princess Anlucia said that I was her lost
half...that I was not whole.

50257.「……でも。アタマの中に ときどき\n 記憶の欠片みたいなものが 現れるんです。:
But sometimes...pieces of my memories
appear within my mind.

50258.「それが もし 私自身の記憶なら\n 私は アンルシア姫さまの半身なんかじゃない:
If those really are my own memories, then I
couldn't possibly be the Princess' other half.

50259.「私は 私の記憶を取り戻したい。\n あの人のことを 思いだしたい……。:
I must get my memory back... I must
remember who they are...

50260.「どうすれば 記憶を取り戻せるの？\n 教えて <pc>さん！？:
There must be some way I can get it back.
Please tell me how, <pc>!

50261.「お困りのようですね。: I see you're in a bit of a bind.

50262.「失礼ながら 話は聞かせてもらいました。: Excuse me, but I overheard everything.

50264.「三門の関所でも お会いしましたが\n このように 話をするのは はじめてですね:
We met at the Three Way Gate, but this is the
first time we have spoken like this. My name
is Claws. I'm a friend of <pc>.

50265.「私には すこしばかり\n 特別なチカラが あるんです。\n そう。人の記憶を操:
I possess a certain...special power.
I have the ability to manipulate people's
memories.

50266.「ミシュアさんの記憶。\n よろしければ 私が 診てさしあげましょう。:
If you'd like, Mishua... I can take a closer
look at your memory.

50267.「それで 記憶が取り戻せるなら……\n ぜひ お願いします！:
If that's what it takes to get my memory
back... then please! Do it!

50268.「おまかせを。では 失礼……。: All right. Just leave it to me.

50270.「記憶に触れることが できません。\n どうやら 記憶そのものが\n 何かのチカ:
It seems I can't see your memories. Something
is causing them to be locked away.

50272.「どうして 記憶が封じられているのか……\n それは 私にも わかりませんが\n:
I don't know what it is that's doing this,
but... that doesn't mean it's impossible to
access them.

50273.「ですが……。その前に あなたに\n ひとつだけ 聞いておきましょう。:
But... before I go any further, let me ask you
one thing.

50274.「封じられた記憶を取り戻したとき\n あなたは 自分に課せられた 過酷な運命を\:
When you retrieve your sealed memories, you
may realize the cruel fate that has been
imposed upon you.

50275.「あなたが それに耐えられる保証はない。\n それでも かまいませんか？:
I can't guarantee you will be able to live
with that truth. Can you handle that?

50276.「かまいません！\n どんなに ひどい記憶だったとしても\n それは 私の大切な:
It doesn't matter. No matter how bad the
memories are, they're MY memories!

50277.「私のそばにいてくれた 誰か……。\n その人のためにも 私は絶対に\n 思いだ:
I recall someone precious who has been there
for me... For the sake of that person, I must
absolutely remember!

50278.「それを聞いて 安心しました。: I am relieved to hear that.

50279.「封じられた記憶を よみがえらせるには\n 誰かが あなたの記憶の中に入り\n:
To retrieve a sealed memory, one must enter
your memories and break the seal.

50280.「さあ <pc>さん 出番ですよ。:
Now, <pc>.
That's where you come in.

50281.「以前 三門の関所を通るとき……\n あなたに 集めていただいた ３匹の蝶。\n:
When we passed through the Three Way Gate...
I asked you to collect for me three
butterflies. Do you remember?

50282.「今こそ その蝶が 羽ばたく時です。:
It's time for those butterflies to flap their
wings.

50283.「美しいでしょう？\n 記憶の世界へ いざなう 神秘の扉です。:
Beautiful, isn't it? That mystical door will
take you to the world of memories.

50284.「この扉に足を踏み入れれば そこはもう\n ミシュアさんの 記憶の中の世界。\n:
Once you step through, you will find yourself
already deep within Mishua's memories. Now,
approach the pillar of light.

50300.「アンルシアさま。先ほど 話した\n 私を化け物から 救ってくれた人というのが\:
Miss Anlucia, this is the person who saved me
from that monster I mentioned. Their
name is <pc>.

50301.「……ほう。\n お前が メルサンディ村に 現れた魔物を\n 退治してくれた 英:
Wow... so you're the hero who defeated the
monsters of Melsandy Village, huh?

50302.「レンダーシアの秩序を乱す\n 魔物を討伐してくれたこと 感謝する。\n 亡き父:
I thank you for defeating those monsters that
tried to disturb the peace of Lendersia. I
thank you on behalf of my late father.

50303.「……ところで <pc>よ。\n ずいぶん 遠くから 旅して来たそうだが\n お:
By the way, <pc>...
You've come a long way to get here.
Where are you from?

50304.「<%sEV_SHUSHIN_T>か……。\n レンダーシアの者でもない お前が:
I see, you're not from this land...
Why did you risk your life traveling so far to
come here?

50305.「……なに 勇者覚醒の光を見ただと？\n その勇者の手助けをするため\n 我が国:
What? You saw the light of the Hero's
awakening? And you came here to help that
Hero?

50307.「ははははっ！\n これは 面白いことを言う。\n お前は きっと 夢でも見たの:
Ha ha ha! What a funny thing to say. You
must've been dreaming!

50308.「確かに 私は 勇者としての使命を\n 授かってはいるが まだ 覚醒の時を\n:
It is true that I have been given a mission as
the Hero, but I have not yet reached my time
of awakening.

50309.「おそらく 今の私には 勇者として覚醒するのに\n 何か 足りないものがあるのだ:
Perhaps there's something I'm lacking that's
preventing me from doing so...

50310.「だが お前の見た夢は すぐに正夢と変わるぞ。\n 必ずや 私は 覚醒の時を迎え:
But dreams will soon turn to reality. I will
awaken when the time is right!

50311.「<pc>。遠路はるばる ご苦労だった。\n お前も この城で ゆっくりと\n:
You've worked hard to come all this way.
You too may relax here in the castle after
such a long journey.

50312.「リゲス大臣。ダイム老を ここへ。: Minister Rigez. Bring Dyme to me.

50313.「ミシュア。記憶喪失では 何かと不便だろう。\n お前には世話係として 従者を付:
Mishua, I know it must be difficult to not remember anything. I will assign a squire to look after you. He has served here for many
years and is quite skilled.

50314.「お呼びでございましょうか アンルシア姫さま。: You wanted to see me, Princess?

50315.「来てくれたか ダイム老。\n このミシュアの世話を お前にまかせる。\n 記憶:
Ah, Dyme. I entrust you with the care of our
guest, Mishua. She's lost her memory.

50316.「おお 話には聞いておりましたが\n まことに 姫さま そっくりでございますな。:
Oh, I've heard so much about you! You're the
spitting image of the Princess herself. But,
to have amnesia is quite unfortunate...

50317.「おまかせください アンルシア姫さま。\n このダイムが 責任を持って\n ミシ:
Leave it to me, Princess. I, Dyme, will take
full responsibility for Mishua's care.

50318.「あの……すみません。\n 本当に いいんですか。私なんかのために。:
Um... excuse me, but... are you sure it's
okay? All this just for me?

50319.「気にすることはない。この城にいることで\n お前の記憶が 取り戻せるというのな:
Please don't worry. If staying here will help
you to regain your memories, then you're
welcome to stay as long as you like.

50320.「今日のところは 貸し与えた部屋で\n 身体を休めるが いいだろう。:
For now, you should rest in the room I've
provided for you.

50322.「……お言葉に 甘えさせてもらいます。\n ありがとうございます アンルシア姫さ:
You are really too kind... thank you so much,
Princess Anlucia.

50323.「<pc>。\n お前には 東の塔の最上階の部屋を与えよう。:
And <pc>. Your room is located
on the top floor of the east tower.

50324.「東の塔は 南の階段を上った３階の奥だ。\n 部屋の前の番兵には 話を通しておく:
The east tower is on the third floor up the
south stairs. I'll talk to the guard there,
so feel free to use it to rest.

50325.「私は まだ 公務があるのでな。\n 話があるなら また明日 聞くとしよう。\n:
I still have official business to attend to.
If you need to talk, we can talk tomorrow.
Just take it easy for today.

50326.「この部屋は 王族の方々が\n おくつろぎになるための部屋で ございます。:
This room is for the relaxation of the royal
family.

50329.「ミシュアさま。いかがなされました？: Miss Mishua, are you all right?

50330.「ごめんなさい。何かが……。\n よく わからないけど アタマの中で\n 一瞬:
I'm sorry. I don't know what it was exactly
but... I saw an image in my head for just a
moment there.

50331.「もしや 記憶を取り戻されたのでは？: Does this mean your memory has returned?

50332.「ダメなんです。何かを見たはずなのに\n もう 思いだせないの……。\n 私……:
No... not yet. I definitely did see something,
but I can't remember what it was... What
did I just see...?

50333.「落ち着いてくださいませ ミシュアさま。\n ご無理をなさっては いけません。:
Please calm down. You mustn't be too hard on
yourself.

50335.「私…… このグランゼドーラ王国へ来れば\n 何か 思いだせると 思ってました。:
I.. I thought coming here would help to jog
my memory.

50336.「でも ダメみたい……。\n 思いだせそうな気がしたけど\n 何かに 邪魔されて:
But it's no use... I thought I'd remembered
something, but it's almost as if something is
holding it back...

50337.「人の記憶とは 不思議なもの。\n アタマで覚えていなくても 身体が覚えている。:
Human memory is a mysterious thing. Even if
your mind doesn't remember, your body
remembers instead. It certainly can happen.

50338.「この城で暮らす間に 何かのきっかけで\n 記憶が戻るということも ありえましょ:
It is possible that during your stay here,
something may happen to jog your memory.
The important thing is not to rush yourself.

50339.「また明日 私と この城をめぐってみましょう。\n 私は長く この王国に仕えてお:
Tomorrow, I'll take you on a tour of the
castle. I've served here long enough that I
can show you anywhere you'd like to see.

50340.「今日のところは 部屋で ゆっくりと\n お休みになられるのが よろしいかと。\:
For the time being, I think it would be wise
to rest in your room for a good night's sleep.
Please come with me.

50341.「<pc>さんも 東の塔のお部屋へ\n 向かうところだったのですよね。\n 引き:
You were on your way to the east tower? I'm
sorry if I held you up...

50342.「あっ 起こしてしまいましたか。\n あのですね。姫さまから 伝言を\n 申しつ:
Oh, did I wake you? I have a message from the
Princess.

50343.「それでですね。<pc>さまには\n 玉座の間まで お越しいただきたいと\n そ:
She would like you to meet her in the throne
room.

50344.「確かに お伝えしましたから。\n では 失礼いたします。: And that's all. Now, if you'll excuse me.

50345.「おお <pc>。よく来てくれたな。: Ah, <pc>. Good of you to come.

50347.「ふたりを呼んだのは 他でもない。: I've called you two here together.

50348.「近隣の洞くつに 赤き巨竜が現れ\n 暴れているという情報が 届いたのだ。\n:
I've received word that a Red Dragon has
appeared in a nearby cave and is on a
rampage. I will go and take care of it.

50349.「……そこでだ。\n どうだ ミシュア。この赤き巨竜の討伐に\n お前も 同行す:
...that is all. Well, Mishua? Will you join me
in defeating the dragon?

50350.「えっ。私が……ですか？\n 私が行っても お役に立てるとは……。:
What? Me...? I don't know if I can be of any
help to you if I go...

50351.「ふふっ もちろん お前に\n 戦えなどと言うつもりは ないさ。:
Heh, heh. Of course, I won't have you do any
actual fighting.

50352.「私と 行動を共にしていれば\n お前の記憶に よい影響が\n あるのではないか:
I thought it might be good for your memory if
you stay close to me.

50353.「……そうかも しれません。\n わかりました。私 行きます！: You may be right... Okay. I'll come with you!

50354.「恐れながら アンルシア姫さま。\n ミシュアさまを そのような場所に\n 連れ:
With all due respect, Princess... I think it
would be quite dangerous to take Miss Mishua
to such a place.

50355.「このようなとき 行方知れずとなった\n 孫のテグラムが おりましたなら\n 警:
At a time like this, if my missing grandson
Tegram were still here, he would have been the
perfect person to protect you...

50357.「だが ミシュアの警護なら 案ずることはない。\n <pc>を呼んだのは そのた:
But, if you're worried about Mishua, she'll
be fine. I called <pc> here to
protect her.

50358.「<pc>。ミシュアの警護のため\n 共に 洞くつまで 行ってくれないか？\n:
<pc>. Will you go with me to the
cave to protect Mishua? I'm certain she will
feel safe if you come along.<yesno><close>

50359.「つれないことを言うな。\n ミシュアの記憶のためなんだ。\n 共に 洞くつへ:
Don't be ridiculous. This is about restoring
Mishua's memory. Will you come with me to
the cave?<yesno><close>

50360.「<pc>さん お願いします。\n アンルシア姫さまのおっしゃるように 私を\n:
Please, <pc>...
Won't you please reconsider coming to the
cave with us?<yesno><close>

50361.「おお 引き受けてくれるのだな。: Ah, so you will come then.

50362.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n 私のために すみません。:
Thank you. I'm sorry you have to do this for
my sake.

50363.「では 出発だ。赤き巨竜が現れたのは\n グランゼドーラ領より南の ロヴォス高地:
Let's get going. The dragon appeared deep in
a cave called Zedra Cave in the Rovos
Highlands, south of the Gran Zedora Territory.

50364.「私は ひと足先に ゼドラ洞へ向かう。\n <pc>。ミシュアのこと\n よろし:
I'll head over to Zedra Cave first. Take care
of Mishua, will you?

50365.「私も準備をして すぐに行きますので\n 城下町の入り口で 待ち合わせましょう。:
As soon as I'm ready, I'll meet you at the
castle town entrance. See you soon!

50366.「お待たせしました <pc>さん。\n 準備できましたので 行きましょう。:
Sorry to keep you waiting. I'm ready now, so
let's go.

50367.「赤き巨竜が出たのは たしか……\n グランゼドーラ領より南の ロヴォス高地にあ:
She said that dragon appeared in a cave called
Zedra Cave... which is south of the Gran
Zedora Territory in the Rovos Highlands.

50368.「<pc>さんの後ろを しっかり\n ついていくので 私のことは気にせず\n ゼ:
I'll be right behind you, so don't worry about
me. Let's head for that cave.

50370.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n おかげで 無事に ここまで来れました:
Thanks to you, we made it here without any
trouble.

50371.「ミシュアも来たか。これで そろったな。:
Good, you're here too. Now everyone's
accounted for.

50372.「赤き巨竜の巣は この奥だ。\n 途中の道にも 魔物がいるだろう。\n 油断は:
The Red Dragon Nest is deeper in the cave.
There will be monsters along the way, so be
on your guard.

50395.「来たか ふたりとも。\n 残念だが 赤き巨竜の姿は見えないようだ。:
There you two are. Sorry, but it seems like
the dragon is not here.

50396.「おそらく アンルシア姫さまに\n 恐れをなして 逃げだしたのでしょう！:
Maybe it was too afraid of the Princess, so it
ran off!

50397.「ふっ。なら よいがな……。\n ところで ミシュア。\n 道中で 何か思いだす:
Heh. If that's the case, then good...
Anyways, Mishua. Has anything triggered your
memory yet?

50399.「そうか。それは 残念だ。\n だが あせる必要はないぞ。:
I see. That's unfortunate. But there's no need
to worry.

50407.「そのチカラ……。\n それは 紛れもなく 勇者のチカラだ。:
That power... there's no mistaking it. That's
the power of the Hero.

50409.「私が失った半身。ついに 手に入れたぞ！: My lost half... I finally have it, at last!

50410.「失った……半身？\n アンルシア姫さま 何を言ってるの……？: Lost... half? What are you talking about...?

50411.「私が いくら努力しても\n 勇者に覚醒できないのは なぜなのか？:
Why is it that no matter how hard I try, I
cannot awaken into becoming a Hero?

50412.「私には 何かが足りない。何かが欠けている。\n それが原因だと ずっと感じてい:
I needed something more. I always felt that
something was missing.

50413.「城で お前と出会ったとき\n それが なんだったのか 悟ることができたよ。:
When I met you in the castle, it was then that
I realized what I was missing.

50414.「お前こそ 私の失われた半身……。\n いつの間にか 勇者のチカラを奪って\n:
You are my lost half... without realizing it,
you had taken the Hero's power and slipped
away from me...

50415.「記憶がないのも 当然だ。\n 私から 抜けだしたお前は ひとりの人間として\n:
It's no wonder you lost your memories. You
separated from me, and do not exist in this
world as a whole person.

50416.「グランゼドーラ城を目指し\n 私の前に現れたのは 無意識に\n もとの場所へ:
Your purpose in coming back to Gran Zedora
was unknowingly to come back to me.

50418.「お前と ひとつになることで\n 私は 勇者として 覚醒を迎えられる！！:
By becoming one with you, I will finally
awaken as a Hero!!

50419.「<pc> よろこべ。\n お前の見た夢が 正夢になる時が来たぞ。:
Behold, <pc>. It's time for your
dream to become a reality!

50420.「儀式の準備を 始めなくてはならんな。\n 急いで 城へ戻るぞ！:
We must prepare for the ceremony. Back to the
castle at once!

50421.「アンルシア姫さまの命により\n この先は 立ち入り禁止となった。:
By order of Princess Anlucia, the area beyond
this point is now off limits.

50422.「客人であろうと 通すわけには いかぬ。\n すみやかに ここから 立ち去られよ:
We cannot let you pass, even if you are a
guest. Leave here at once.

50424.「ミシュアさまのことで\n <pc>さまに お話があるのです。\n こちらへ……:
I'd like to speak with you about Mishua.
Please come this way...

50425.「じつは……。私も ミシュアさまのいる\n 塔のお部屋へは 近づくなと\n アン:
Actually... the Princess ordered me to stay
away from Mishua's room.

50426.「アンルシア姫さまは 勇者覚醒の儀式に\n ミシュアが必要だとしか 教えてくれま:
The only thing she told me is that Mishua is
needed for the ceremony to awaken the Hero.
What on earth happened in that cave?

50427.「……なんと。ミシュアさまが\n アンルシア姫さまの 失われた半身ですと？\n:
Oh, my... Mishua is the lost half of the
Princess? T-that cannot be...

50428.「アンルシア姫さまは ミシュアさまを\n どうする おつもりなのか……。: I wonder what she plans to do with her...

50429.「<pc>さま。\n ミシュアさまは今 たいへん\n 危険な状態にあるのかも し:
<pc>. Mishua may be in grave
danger right now.

50430.「……城下で たびたび 行方不明の者が\n 出ているという話は ご存知でしょうか:
Have you heard about the people of the castle
frequently disappearing?

50431.「じつは 私の孫のテグラムも\n その中の ひとりなのです……。:
Sad to say, but my grandson Tegram was one
of those people...

50432.「行方不明となった者は いずれも\n アンルシア姫さまに お目通りした直後に\n:
I was told that everyone who went missing
disappeared shortly after meeting with the
Princess.

50433.「しかし これまで誰も それを\n 疑問に思う者は いなかったのです。\n 私自:
But until now, no one has questioned it. I
myself was one of them...

50434.「愛する孫が いなくなっても\n それが 当たり前のことに思えて\n 疑問すら:
I didn't even question the disappearance of
my own grandson...

50435.「なぜ 今まで 孫が行方不明になったことを\n 気に留めなかったのかは わかりま:
I'm not sure why, but I never really thought
about his disappearance until just now... It's
like something was clouding my mind...

50436.「……このままでは ミシュアさまの身にも\n 何事か 起こるかもしれません。:
...If things continue as they are, something
bad may happen to Mishua.

50438.<pc>は ダイム老から\n古びた銀のカギ（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received
an Old Silver Key (Key Item) from Old Man
Dyme!<me 60>

50439.「ミシュアさまの囚われている塔には\n 城に 危険が及んだ際 王家の方々が\n:
In the tower where Mishua is being held, there
is a secret passage for the royal family to
evacuate in case of danger.

50440.「秘密の通路は 外に出るための洞くつ……。\n 海風の洞くつに つながっておりま:
The secret passage leads into a cave... it's
called Seabreeze Cave. You can get into the
tower using the cave as well.

50441.「先ほど お渡ししたカギは\n 海風の洞くつと 秘密の通路をつなぐ扉を\n 開け:
The key I just gave you will open the door
that connects the secret passage to that
cave.

50442.「海風の洞くつは 人目に付かぬ所にあります。\n 城の西 レビュール街道北へと向:
Seabreeze Cave is hidden in plain sight. To
the west of the castle, head to Reviewle
Highway North and look for a sea-facing cave.

50443.「私は ミシュアさまが 心配でなりません。\n <pc>さま ミシュアさまのこと:
I'm worried about Miss Mishua.
<pc>, please take care of her.

50444.「おや？ 誰かと思って\n 後をつけたら あなたでしたか。:
Hm? I followed behind to see who it was, and
look who it is.

50445.「おひさしぶりです <pc>さん。\n おウワサは いろいろと聞いていますよ。:
It's been a while. I've heard quite a few
rumors.

50446.「ほう……。こんな場所に\n 洞くつの入り口が あったとは。\n これは たいへ:
Interesting... I had no idea there was a cave
entrance here.

50447.「ふむ。<pc>さんは\n この奥を目指そうと しているわけですか。:
I see... So you're planning on going deeper
into this cave?

50448.「それでは 私も ちょっと\n 中を のぞいてみるとしましょう。\n お先に失礼:
In that case, I'll go take a quick peek.
Excuse me.

50450.「アラハギーロでは ご苦労でしたね。\n ベルムドは すでに暴走を始めていました:
I heard about what happened in Al-Ahagiro.
Bermud really went off the deep end, didn't
he? It's a good thing you were there.

50453.「ヒョヒョヒョッ。それは 結構。\n 貴重な実験素材は できるだけ\n キズつけ:
Nyeh heh heh... very good. We don't want our
precious test subject suffering any
unnecessary damage.

50454.「今回の実験は 気合いを入れますよ。\n なんといっても 実験素材が\n 並のチ:
I'm quite excited about this experiment. After
all, our test subject this time has no
ordinary power.

52751.部屋の中から 話し声が 聞こえてくる……。:
Voices can be heard coming from inside the
room...

52752.「それで バスラー君。\n 新たな実験素材は どんな様子ですか？:
So, Bassler... Is the new test subject coming
along well?

52753.「はっ。キルギルさま。\n あの娘は 塔の部屋で おとなしくしています。\n 暴:
Yes, Master Kirgyl. She's still in her room in
the tower. She's shown no signs of resistance.

52754.「さあ 準備を急ぎましょう。\n 大量の魔力を 集めなくてはいけません。\n 護:
Now, I must prepare. I must gather lots of
magical energy. I'll leave the protection
up to you.

52756.「では 狩りに出かけるとしましょうか。\n ヒョッヒョッヒョッ。: Let's go hunting, shall we? Nyeh heh heh.

53832.「あっ <pc>さん。\n 心配して 見にきてくれたんですね。:
Oh, <pc>. Did you come to see
me because you were worried?

53833.「私なら 大丈夫です。\n こんなに立派な お部屋に泊まれるなんて\n 思っても:
Don't worry, I'm fine. I never thought I'd
stay in a room this nice...

53834.「この部屋は アンルシア姫さまの部屋です。\n ですが 姫さまは やれ 魔物退治:
This room belongs to the Princess. But she's
always busy defeating monsters and visiting
other lands.

53835.「城にいるときも 公務のためと\n 玉座の間に閉じこもり 執務室で眠る始末……。:
When she's here, she just stays holed up in the throne room and even sleeps there... She says it's official business. So she never
uses her room.

53836.「アンルシア姫さま 大変そう……。\n でも そのおかげで 私みたいな者が\n:
She really works so hard... but it's thanks to
her that someone like me can use such a nice
room like this.

53837.「私は疲れたので もう 休むことにします。\n <pc>さんも ご自分のお部屋で:
I'm feeling tired, so I think I'm going to
get some rest. I think you should do the same.

53838.「<pc>さまは 向かいの\n 東の塔の部屋を お使いください。\n この部屋と:
<pc>, you may use the room in the
east tower on the opposite side. It looks
the same as this room does.

75941.「あなたを グランゼドーラ城まで 連行します。\n どうか 抵抗など なさらぬよ:
We're taking you to back to the castle.
Please, do not resist...
